message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.MA, cs.CV

The paper focuses on designing a practical framework for preventing distracted pedestrian-related incidents using mobile and wearable devices equipped with high-precision on-board sensors. This involves the use of complex activity recognition frameworks to detect pedestrian distractions in real-time. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC), followed by Cybersecurity (cs.CY), Social and Information Networks (cs.SI), Machine Learning (cs.MA), and Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV).
